attributes.action: Increase the minimum recommended width of parking spaces from 2.4 metres to 2.7.
attributes.background: The minimum recommended width of parking spaces was 2.4 metres in 1978 and perhaps even earlier when family cars were much narrower and vehicles such as suv's didn't exist. Insurance companies say over 30% of minor claims arise from car park damage. It is time to revise the standards.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this is the responsibility of your local council and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. 

You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
